activeQuests.title: Superstition and Shadows
activeQuests.description: Old Tommen believes a wandering spirit haunts the village. If the party investigates, they may encounter the Wandering Shade--a restless ghost whose cryptic words offer hints about the keep and the missing villagers.

activeQuests.title: Trouble at the Hearth
activeQuests.description: Cira the Innkeeper's cellar is plagued by minor poltergeist activity. Calming the spirit earns Cira's gratitude and a helpful clue about Scout Elen's last known movements.

activeQuests.title: The Keeper's Warning
activeQuests.description: A mysterious hermit known as the Keeper dwells near the forest edge. They possess knowledge about the keep's curse but require assistance or convincing to share it.

activeQuests.title: The Black Banner Mercenaries
activeQuests.description: A band of mercenaries camps near the keep, seeking treasure. They may be allies, rivals, or obstacles depending on party interactions.

activeQuests.title: Resolution and Rewards
activeQuests.description: With the curse lifted, the party returns to Harrow's Hollow as heroes. Elder Mirna and the villagers celebrate their success. Rewards, both material and social, await. New opportunities and adventures may present themselves as the party's reputation spreads.
